content=The Knight's Tournament takes place every year on the last weekend in May. More than 300 re-enactors and 30 horsemen, dozens of tents, a medieval marketplace and a jousting arena re-create a medieval atmosphere. There are archery, knave and sword-fighting competitions as well as jousting. Don't miss it!
("The Old Carters' Inn") near Oldendorf in the forest. Traditional, rustic, German restaurant specialising in game - venison, wild boar and
, the local moorland sheep. Not cheap, but great for that special occasion.
directions=From Celle, go straight through Hermannsburg, across the river and the restaurant is approx 300m on the left
content=Authentic Italian look and feel. Good quality food at sensible price. Highly recommended.
